org.waarp.ftp.core.control

Class NetworkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<String>
          • org.waarp.ftp.core.control.NetworkHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SslNetworkHandler

    public class NetworkHandler
extends io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<String>
    Main Network Handler (Control part) implementing RFC 959, 775, 2389, 2428, 3659 and supports XCRC and XMD5 commands.
    Author:
    Frederic Bregier
